name: Old Tumblr Dashboard colour
description: This code will revert your dashboard to the original background colour.
additional_info:
February 19th 2019: Tumblr has also changed the colour of the Customisation panel code markup so I've added an update to undo the neon colours in the syntax highlighting.

February 18th 2019: Tumblr has taken down one the CSS class name which introduced the new colour scheme so I have to update the code in the extension get the old colour back. Please reinstall the plugin to get the Classic Tumblr Blue back on your dash.

discussions.name: This only do the background though apparently, it doesn't revert all the icons etc
